alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Upper Gunnison River Valley; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gunnison County through 515 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gunnison, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gunnison, Mount Crested Butte and Crested Butte. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 152 and 153, and between mile markers 157 and 158. Colorado 135 between mile markers 1 and 7, and between mile markers 23 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Upper Gunnison River Valley; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
